Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory262.png'}
{3: 'Murray is walking on the Eden 16-B road, checking his handheld terminal from time to time.'}
{3: 'Up high, two pairs of eyes—Valeria and Bazhi—are monitoring him from both sides.'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Point A, target confirmed.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Point B, target confirmed.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Don't you find it a bit fishy?"}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Why?'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "If he knows he's being tracked, why would he look so defenseless?"}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'You have a point. Run a scan.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Roger.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "...I knew he's up to something."}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Details?'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "It's a lure. The real deal is hiding in a corner and waiting for us."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Not a bad attempt, but unfortunately, I'm not your run-of-the-mill support Construct."}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "Well then. Plan B it is. I'll ambush from the blind spot on the left, and you go from the right."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Are we putting him down?'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Let me get a confirmation first.'}
{3: 'Valeria begins tinkering with her terminal to contact someone outside, but to no avail.'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "Can't get a signal."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Is Gestalt doing this?'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Or our bad boy over there?'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Both possible.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Then what? Do we still go all the way?'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "We can't get an ID on the kid right now. If he's an ally, and we're the backup..."}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "We'll go for a non-lethal approach. But if push comes to shove, then we'll take him down."}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'We can chuck it on Commander Nikola. He gave the orders.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Never see you so slimy normally. Then let's go."}
